effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a []{pokemon:minccino} into []{pokemon:cinccino}, a []{pokemon:roselia} into []{pokemon:roserade}, or a []{pokemon:togetic} into []{pokemon:togekiss}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ある　特定の　ポケモンを
進化させる　不思議な　石。
ひかりのように　まぶしい。

A peculiar stone that can make
certain species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

Pietra particolare che fa evolvere determinate
specie di Pokémon. Brilla di una luce abbagliante.

Una piedra peculiar que hace evolucionar a
algunos Pokémon. Tiene un brillo espectacular.

Dieser besondere, hell leuchtende Stein hilft
manchen Pokémon bei ihrer Evolution.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer certaines
espèces de Pokémon. Elle brille d’une lumière
aveuglante.

어느 특정 포켓몬을
진화시키는 이상한 돌.
빛처럼 눈부시다.

ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
ひかりのように　まぶしい。

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

Pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon. Elle
brille d’une lumière aveuglante.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.
